0.Pros: I started to work at mcds on july 21 2016, i have done everything from crew to maintenance, its a great start in the workforce and there very flexible with your life schedule.
0.Cons: Working at mcds is very stressful especially for my position , the pay is not very well its minimun wage . You will never be appreciated there for ypur hard work.

1.Pros: Flexible scheduling and room for growth. There's ample opportunities for enhancing skills like time management, money handling, problem solving skills. I always enjoy making customers smile during a simple interaction so it's an excellent job to hone your customer service skills.
1.Cons: High crew turnover, minimal appreciation, and rude customer interactions. There is often a noticeable split between individuals who at least want to do a good job and those who just want to make it through a shift alive. As an employee who went up the ranks, there were many times where I felt like I was unappreciated, despite working extremely hard to make sure the store was functioning and that customers were receiving the highest level of service.

2.Pros: Very good for someone looking to build work experience.

5.Pros: Good Pay, Nice Breaks, Always Have Something To Do, Good Discounts.

6.Pros: Very great first time experience, learns to multi task and Patience.
6.Cons: Low pay unfair with hire pay
